<template>
  <NavigationHeader/>
  <router-view></router-view>
</template>

<script>
import NavigationHeader from '@/components/NavigationHeader.vue';

export default {
  name: 'App',
  components: {
    NavigationHeader
  }
}
</script>

<style>
body {
	background-color: #f5f5f5;
}
* {
	box-sizing: border-box;
}
#app {
	font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
	-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
	-moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
	text-align: center;
	color: #2c3e50;
	margin-top: 60px;
	padding-bottom: 60px;
}

h1 {
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

.card {
	border-radius: 20px;
	max-width: 500px;
	margin: 0 auto;
	padding: 4rem;
	background-color: #fff;
	box-shadow: 2.8px 2.8px 2.2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.02),
	6.7px 6.7px 5.3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.028),
	12.5px 12.5px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.035),
	22.3px 22.3px 17.9px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.042),
	41.8px 41.8px 33.4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05),
	100px 100px 80px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.07);
}

.overline {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	letter-spacing: .1em;
	font-weight: bold;
}

button {
	border: none;
	background-color: cyan;
}

fieldset {
	border: none;
	text-align: left;
	max-width: 500px;	
	margin: 0 auto 40px;
}

fieldset:not(:last-of-type) {
	border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc;
	padding-bottom: 40px;
}

legend {
	text-transform: uppercase;
	font-weight: bold;
	margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.field {
	font-size: 16px;
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 100%;
}

.field > * {
	display: block;
}

label {
	font-size: .85em;
	font-weight: bold;
	color: #666;
	margin-bottom: 0.5em;
}

input {
	font-size: 1em;
	width: 100%;
	height: 36px;
	padding: 0 12px;
}

.field-group {
	display: flex;
	justify-content: space-between;
}

.field-group > .field {
	width: calc(50% - 10px);
}
</style>
